web_snippets: President Joe Biden nominated her to the FTC in March 2021, and after her confirmation she became the youngest FTC chair ever in June 2021. Lina Khan.
Lina Khan (born March 3, 1989, London, England) is a British-born American legal scholar who served as commissioner and chair of the U.S. ...
